links.*: The Disaster of the Gladden Fields
The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor

wikitext.*:
'''''lanc''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word with the following meanings:
#"naked"<ref>{{UT|7}}, note 12</ref>
#"sharp edge (not of tools), sudden end (as a cliff-edge, or the clean edge of things made by hand or built)"<ref>{{VT|42a}}, p. 8</ref>
==Examples==
*''lanc'' ("naked")
**''[[Amon Lanc]]''
